title: The Light Side / Dark Side Run
desc: The Light Side / Dark Side Run is a  VIRTUAL RACE  that can be done anywhere, any distance!  All proceeds will benefit ASPCA,?an amazing organization that provides life-saving programs and services to millions of animals worldwide. Sign up, we will email you a Light Side & Dark Side bib (you choose which side you want to run for!) Since February 20th is Love Your Pet Day, we could think of no better day to kick off our race. Run or walk your distance on any day that week, with your choice of location, rain or shine. Run by yourself, run with friends, take your dog out for a stroll, you can even walk your cat! (Although we highly advise against this option!) Snap a picture on Instagram, Facebook or Twitter with your chosen bib using the hashtag # ASPCALightSide  or  #ASPCADarkSide , and we will send you this awesome 3" DOUBLE-SIDED Light Side / Dark Side medal to add to your collection! - Light Side & Dark Side Electronic bibs emailed to you prior to the race? - 3" double-sided Light Side / Dark Side medal? Due to the upfront nature of event costs, we cannot offer refunds, transfers, or deferrals, no exceptions. ?Make sure that you are good to go when you sign up!
